knimeNode.name: Service Table Output
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads the content of a table and makes it available to an external caller.

fullDescription.intro: Reads the content of a table and makes it available to an external caller. This node is used in KNIME server web services, where the result of the web service is represented by the input of this node.
fullDescription.option: A name, which serves as key in the resulting JSON object. This is used to assert uniqueness in case multiple output results (nodes) are present in workflow.
A description for the output parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.

ports.outPort: An optional output that directly forwards the input of the node.
